mapper.select: SELECT ri.id, ri.repair_code, ri.staff_id, ri.repair_status, ri.remark, ri.create_date FROM repair_info ri WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.repair_status IN (0, 1, 2)

SELECT si.`name`, si.id, IFNULL(count( ri.id ), 0) AS workStatus FROM staff_info si LEFT JOIN repair_info ri ON ( ri.staff_id = si.id ) AND ri.repair_status IN ( 0, 1, 2 ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.responsible LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productId},'%')
GROUP BY si.id

SELECT ri.id, ri.repair_code, ri.staff_id, ri.repair_status, ri.remark, ri.create_date, oi.order_name, si.NAME AS staffName, pi1.id AS productId, pi1.NAME AS productName, pi1.`type` AS productType, pi1.images FROM repair_info ri LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON ( si.id = ri.staff_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.repair_code = ri.repair_code ) LEFT JOIN product_info pi1 ON ( pi1.id = oi.product_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.repair_code = #{repairCode}

SELECT ri.id, ri.repair_code, ri.staff_id, ri.repair_status, ri.remark, ri.create_date, oi.order_name, pi1.id AS productId, si.NAME AS staffName, pi1.NAME AS productName, pi1.`type` AS productType, pi1.images FROM repair_info ri LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON ( si.id = ri.staff_id ) LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( oi.repair_code = ri.repair_code ) LEFT JOIN product_info pi1 ON ( pi1.id = oi.product_id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND ri.staff_id = #{staffId}
